event.title: assigned to Captain Francis Henry Byrne in 1831

data.event: The suburb, part of a land grant assigned to Captain Francis Henry Byrne in 1831, was believed to have been named Belmont after Byrne's estate in England.

event.title: was purchased by Shepherd Smith of Sydney in 1882

data.event: The land was purchased by Shepherd Smith of Sydney in 1882, who subdivided it in 1897â€“1898.
